ComicInfo.Title: Book One: The Vampire World
ComicInfo.Summary:
The first issue in the Vampire World series adaption of Brian Lumley's Necroscope Vampire World series.
This series ran for two issues, covering book one and two of the Vampire World novels, and followed the original five part series confusingly also title Necroscope.
